title: By the Spring of Life

tokens.lyric: We're marching to the blessed land of Canaan with delight,

lines.raw: [G]We're marching to the blessed land of Canaan with delight,

tokens.lyric: We're leaving all our heavy burdens here.

lines.raw: [C]We're leaving all our heavy burdens here.

tokens.lyric: At last we are released and free from being slaves to sin,

lines.raw: [A7]At last we are released and free from being slaves to sin,

tokens.lyric: We're coming to the blessed spring of life.

lines.raw: [D7]We're coming to the blessed spring of life.

tokens.lyric: Coming to the spring where living water flows;

lines.raw: [G]Coming to the spring where living water flows;

tokens.lyric: In glory we'll be living evermore.
Going to the land where freely flows the spring,

lines.raw: [G]Going to the land where freely flows the spring,

tokens.lyric: In glory we'll be living evermore.
O guide us with your pillars, Lord, of fire and of cloud,

lines.raw: [D7]O guide us with your pillars, Lord, of fire and of cloud,

tokens.lyric: O give us paths to follow with our lives.

lines.raw: [G]O give us paths to follow with our lives.

tokens.lyric: The moment that we cross the Jordan River is at hand,

lines.raw: [C]The moment that we cross the Jordan River is at hand,

tokens.lyric: We're coming to the blessed spring of life.

lines.raw: [D7]We're coming to the blessed spring of life.

tokens.lyric: Our thirsting hearts receive with joy the manna from above,

lines.raw: [G]Our thirsting hearts receive with joy the manna from above,

tokens.lyric: Your precious food will always be our strength

lines.raw: [C]Your precious food will always be our strength

tokens.lyric: So if the future finds us lacking we will not despair

lines.raw: [A7]So if the future finds us lacking we will not despair

tokens.lyric: We're coming to the blessed spring of life.

lines.raw: [D7]We're coming to the blessed spring of life.
